question:
Consider the following statements about the Khelo India Programme:
  1. The programme aims to support about 200 million children in the age group of 10-18 years by enhancing their physical fitness.
  2. The programme aims to provide an annual scholarship of Rs. 5 lakh to 1,000 most talented young athletes each year for 8 consecutive years.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
The salient features of the Khelo India Programme are:
  • The programme will provide a scholarship of Rs 5 lakh to 1,000 most talented young athletes each year for 8 consecutive years across select sports disciplines.
  • The Programme aims to promote 20 universities across the country as hubs of sporting excellence, which would enable talented sportspersons to pursue the dual pathway of education and competitive sports.
  • The Programme would cover about 200 million children in the age group of 10-18 under a massive national physical fitness drive.
